column5: Just booked our trip to Red Lake August 7-14 at Howey Bay. Being this is our first time to Red Lake I was thinking about hiring a Guide for a day. Is it a good idea? Any suggestions on a Guide? Thanks, Mike

There are a number of fellows on this board who are familiar with Red Lake and the Gull Rock area. Surely some of them are guides. If you have no luck, email me. I have a retired friend living in Red Lake who may be able to help you locate someone.Pooch
Invite Bev Chaney to fish with you a couple of days. He knows the lake as well as anyone. Or he could put you onto somebody.

id be very happy to take ya out on red lake for the day i live n fish red lake all yr long as much as i can u can reach me through red lake marine n ask for donny aiken or ya can call me at home and we could make arrangements for something im sure # is 1 807 662 4514 hope this helps n if ya get some one else then best of luck to u n hope ur fishin is awesome
Contact SoulFulCry. No way he can be as grouchy as Bev.
SoulFulCry, thanks for your offer. I will contact you directly to set up the arrangements.

no lol i am no wheres near as crabby as bev lol i have knowin him all my life and ur very welcome u can contact me at any time n we will set something up for u the lake is huge so if u want a specific area u would like to explore or try to do as much in one day as possible then ill do what i can ok again thxx for the offfer i look forward to seein ya in august
